title: Terrifying horror
review:
This is in my top 5 most terrifying horror movies that I have even seen. From the first scene you know and feel that this family is doomed. Toni collete gives the best performance of 2018 as the mother. The final 20 minutes of this film left me feeling sick.
Perfect horror movie.

title: It doesn't get any better!
review: I have seen this movie twice now and it doesn't get any better. This film is a gut wrenching horror masterpiece. 10/10

title: Incredible
review: Best horror movie of the last 20 years. Epic acting performance all round.

title: Not your normal horror movie
review: If you are expecting the generic jump scare rubbish you usually get then go watch some paranormal activity tripe. If you want to watch great acting, directing and a chilling soundtrack you have come to the right place. The last 20 minutes of this film will stay with me for a long time. One of the best horror movies I have ever seen! 10/10

title: Film of the year
review: This is the best film of the year never mind best horror. Chilling and disturbing from start to finish. Bravo!

title: Mesmerising horror
review: This is without doubt one of the best horror films I have ever watched and I have watched a lot. Toni collete gives an Oscar worthy performance. This is a must see!

title: Genius film making
review: You know from the first shot in this film that you're dealing with a skilled film maker. The way the camera goes into the doll house is genius. Toni collete is sensational in this film. The last twenty minutes are spine chilling. Great horror movie!

title: For real horror fans!
review: This might be too much to handle for mainstream horror fans! This isn't your jump scare predictable rubbish. This is filled with great storytelling, directing and acting. Excellent horror movie!

title: Clever horror movie
review: This is one of the more clever horror movies i have seen in a long time. The acting is also great which is unusual for a horror movie. This one really stays with you!
